mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (member_id, product_id, phone, orderdate, zipcode, baseaddress, detailaddress, price) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{phone}, now(), #{zipcode}, #{baseaddress}, #{detailaddress}, #{price})
mapper.update: update orders set phone = {phone}, orderdate = #{orderdate}, dstate = #{dstate}, zipcode = #{zipcode} , baseaddress = #{baseaddress}, detailaddress = #{detailaddress}, price = #{price}, paystate = #{paystate} where order_id = {orderId}
